body:
> This is already included in #21376?

Yes. In #21376 the change in `libxcb.mk` looks like it is motivated by Qt version bumping  to 5.12. But, actually, it is not related to Qt 5.12.

If this justification seems wrong, feel free to close this PR.

ACK 173ef8980d921c9c0e46257747ab1165965e3ced

> Yes. In #21376 the change in libxcb.mk looks like it is motivated by Qt version bumping to 5.12. But, actually, it is not related to Qt 5.12.

I'm not sure that matters too much. However given you've split this out, and some additional background  information is useful, I'm just going to merge this, and then we can finish up in #21376.
